name: Sports: The Best of the Best Quiz | USA | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following NBA players, has scored the most points in their career?
questions.explanation:
Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

	Kareem played side by side Magic Johnson in his career with the Lakers, after playing for the Bucs.

questions.text: Which of these baseball players hit more home runs in their career?
questions.explanation:
Hank Aaron.

	Aaron retired with 755 home runs, mostly with the Braves of Milwaukee and Atlanta.

questions.text: Which football player had thrown for the most yards in an NFL career when he retired in 1999?
questions.explanation:
Dan Marino.

	Dan Marino also set a record for most yards thrown in a season while playing for the Dolphins.

questions.text: Which golfer has the most major championship victories in their career with the PGA?
questions.explanation:
Jack Nicklaus.

	Nicklaus was known as the Golden Bear.  It was he and Arnold Palmer who kept the sport of golf as a household name in their era.

questions.text: Which NHL player has scored the most goals and points in their career?
questions.explanation:
Wayne Gretzky.

	Wayne Gretzky also won 9 Hart trophies in his illustrious career.
